itunes:subtitle: Saagar and guest host Marshall Kosloff talk about the Biden jobs report, declassified 9/11 documents, Trump running in 2024, corporate pushback to Texas' abortion law, men abandoning college, blatant mainstream media fake news, how 9/11 changed the world, the retreat of the American empire, and more!
